verses.verse: "I have <S%H157>loved<s%> <S%H5002>you,<s%>" says <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> Yet you <S%H559>say,<s%> "How have you <S%H157>loved<s%> <S%H6215>us?<s%>" "Wasn't Esau <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>'s <S%H251>brother?<s%>" <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> "Yet I <S%H157>loved<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob;<s%>

but <S%H6215>Esau<s%> I <S%H8130>hated,<s%> and <S%H7760>made<s%> his <S%H2022>mountains<s%> a <S%H8077>desolation,<s%> and gave his <S%H5159>heritage<s%> to the <S%H8568>jackals<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>"

Whereas <S%H123>Edom<s%> <S%H559>says,<s%> "We are <S%H7567>beaten<s%> <S%H7725>down,<s%> but we will return and <S%H1129>build<s%> the waste <S%H2723>places;<s%>" thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> "They shall <S%H1129>build,<s%> but I will throw <S%H2040>down;<s%> and men will <S%H7121>call<s%> <S%H7564>them<s%> 'The Wicked <S%H1366>Land,<s%>' even the <S%H5971>people<s%> against whom <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> shows <S%H2194%H99999>wrath<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>"
Your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> will <S%H7200>see,<s%> and you will <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3068>"Yahweh<s%> is <S%H1431>great<s%>â€” even beyond the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel!<s%>"

"A <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H3513>honors<s%> his <S%H1>father,<s%> and a <S%H5650>servant<s%> his <S%H113>master.<s%> If I am a <S%H1>father,<s%> then where is my <S%H3519>honor?<s%> And if I am a <S%H113>master,<s%> where is the <S%H4172>respect<s%> due <S%H559>me?<s%> Says <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies<s%> to <S%H3548>you,<s%> priests, who <S%H959>despise<s%> my <S%H8034>name.<s%> You <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H959><s%> 'How have we despised your <S%H8034>name?<s%>'

You <S%H5066>offer<s%> <S%H1351>polluted<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> on my <S%H4196>altar.<s%> You <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H1351><s%> 'How have we polluted <S%H559>you?<s%>' In that you say, <S%H3068><s%> 'Yahweh's <S%H7979>table<s%> <S%H959>contemptible.<s%>'

When you <S%H5066>offer<s%> the <S%H5787>blind<s%> for <S%H2076>sacrifice,<s%> <S%H7451>isn't<s%> that evil? And when you <S%H5066>offer<s%> the <S%H6455>lame<s%> and <S%H2470>sick,<s%> <S%H7451>isn't<s%> that evil? <S%H7126>Present<s%> it now to your <S%H6346>governor!<s%> Will he be <S%H7521>pleased<s%> with <S%H5375>you?<s%> Or will he accept your <S%H6440>person?<s%>" <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies.<s%>

<S%H2470>"Now,<s%> please entreat the favor of <S%H410>God,<s%> that he may be <S%H2603>gracious<s%> to <S%H3027>us.<s%> With this, will he <S%H5375>accept<s%> any of <S%H6440>you?<s%>" <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies.<s%>

"Oh that there were one among you who would <S%H5462>shut<s%> the <S%H1817>doors,<s%> that you might not <S%H215>kindle<s%> fire on my <S%H4196>altar<s%> in <S%H2600>vain!<s%> I have no <S%H2656>pleasure<s%> in <S%H559>you,<s%>" says <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> "neither will I <S%H7521>accept<s%> an <S%H4503>offering<s%> at your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

For from the <S%H4217>rising<s%> of the <S%H8121>sun<s%> even to the going <S%H3996>down<s%> of the <S%H8034>same,<s%> my name is <S%H1419>great<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and in every <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H6999>incense<s%> will be <S%H5066>offered<s%> to my <S%H8034>name,<s%> and a <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H4503>offering:<s%> for my <S%H8034>name<s%> is <S%H1419>great<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%>" <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies.<s%>

"But you <S%H2490>profane<s%> <S%H559>it,<s%> in that you say, <S%H3068><s%> 'Yahweh's <S%H7979>table<s%> is <S%H1351>polluted,<s%> and its <S%H5108>fruit,<s%> even its <S%H400>food,<s%> is <S%H959>contemptible.<s%>'

You <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H4972>also,<s%> 'Behold, what a weariness it <S%H5301>is!<s%>' and you have sniffed at <S%H559>it,<s%>" says <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies;<s%> "and you have <S%H935>brought<s%> that which was taken by <S%H1497>violence,<s%> the <S%H6455>lame,<s%> and the <S%H2470>sick;<s%> thus you <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H4503>offering.<s%> Should I <S%H7521>accept<s%> this at your <S%H3027>hand?<s%>" <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

"But the <S%H5230>deceiver<s%> is <S%H779>cursed,<s%> <S%H3426>who<s%> has in his <S%H5739>flock<s%> a <S%H2145>male,<s%> and <S%H5087>vows,<s%> and <S%H2076>sacrifices<s%> to the <S%H136>Lord<s%> a blemished <S%H7843>thing;<s%> for I am a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4428>King,<s%>" <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> "and my <S%H8034>name<s%> is <S%H3372>awesome<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>"
